edu.gcu.cst341.service

Class CustomerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gcu.cst341.service.CustomerService

  • @Service
public class CustomerService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides service methods for Customer transactions in the main controller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int createNewCustomer(Customer cust)
      Creates a new customer in the database by writing customer information to the customers table, login credentials to the credentials table, and account information to the customer_accounts table and customer_transactions table
      int deleteExistingCustomer(Customer cust)
      Deletes an existing customer completely from the database
      Customer getCustomerInfoAndBalances(int custId)
      Retrieves all customer information and account balances from the database
      int updateExistingCustomer(Customer cust)
      Updates an existing customer in the database by writing customer information to the customers table and login credentials to the credentials table.
      boolean userNameExists(java.lang.String usernameToCheck)
      Checks for the existence of a username in the credentials database
      boolean validatePasswordsMatch(java.lang.String password, java.lang.String passCompare)
      Simple helper method to verify a new customer entered the same password twice

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerService

        public CustomerService()

    • Method Detail

      • userNameExists

        public boolean userNameExists(java.lang.String usernameToCheck)
        Checks for the existence of a username in the credentials database
        Parameters:
        usernameToCheck - the username to look up
        Returns:
        true if the username is found; false if not

      • createNewCustomer

        public int createNewCustomer(Customer cust)
        Creates a new customer in the database by writing customer information to the customers table, login credentials to the credentials table, and account information to the customer_accounts table and customer_transactions table
        Parameters:
        cust - the new Customer object
        Returns:
        the number of records written to the database (5 if successful)

      • getCustomerInfoAndBalances

        public Customer getCustomerInfoAndBalances(int custId)
        Retrieves all customer information and account balances from the database
        Parameters:
        custId - the customerId to lookup in the database
        Returns:
        a Customer object with populated data fields

      • validatePasswordsMatch

        public boolean validatePasswordsMatch(java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String passCompare)
        Simple helper method to verify a new customer entered the same password twice
        Parameters:
        password - the first password entered
        passCompare - the second password entered
        Returns:
        true if the passwords match; false if not

      • updateExistingCustomer

        public int updateExistingCustomer(Customer cust)
        Updates an existing customer in the database by writing customer information to the customers table and login credentials to the credentials table. Accounts and transactions are NOT allowed to change by business rule
        Parameters:
        cust - the updated Customer object
        Returns:
        the number of records written to the database

      • deleteExistingCustomer

        public int deleteExistingCustomer(Customer cust)
        Deletes an existing customer completely from the database
        Parameters:
        cust - the existing customer object to delete
        Returns:
        the number of records deleted (more than 0 if successful, 0 if not or if cust is null)
